alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:25PM EDT until August 12 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lewis County in central New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Highmarket, or 10 miles northeast of Camden, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Swancott Mill and West Leyden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
